common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/fbl/fulfillment_sku/create')
request.add_api_parameter("fulfillment_sku_name", "SPORTLAND \u0E2D\u0E34\u0E19\u0E44\u0E25\u0E19\u0E4C \u0E2A\u0E40\u0E01\u0E47\u0E15 In-line Skate \u0E23\u0E38\u0E48\u0E19 SL-120 ")
request.add_api_parameter("barcodes", "[\"LZD000000063206\",\"8859295109033\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("hygroscopic", "true")
request.add_api_parameter("precious", "true")
request.add_api_parameter("product_type", "food")
request.add_api_parameter("temperature_requirement", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("pic_urls", "[\"https://th-live-02.slatic.net/p/sportland-inailn-sekt-in-line-skate-run-sl-120-gray-yellow-s-7899-583337-d61a153af3f15bc83f31fa2aeec6db4d-catalog.jpg\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("serial_number_flag", "true")
request.add_api_parameter("shelf_life_flag", "true")
request.add_api_parameter("shelf_life_days", "1825")
request.add_api_parameter("reject_shelf_live", "180")
request.add_api_parameter("alert_shelf_live", "60")
request.add_api_parameter("offline_shelf_live", "30")
request.add_api_parameter("seller_sku", "xxxxxxx")
request.add_api_parameter("sale_price", "32.25")
request.add_api_parameter("length", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("width", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("height", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("weight", "300")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/fbl/fulfillment_sku/create')
request.add_api_param('fulfillment_sku_name', 'SPORTLAND \u0E2D\u0E34\u0E19\u0E44\u0E25\u0E19\u0E4C \u0E2A\u0E40\u0E01\u0E47\u0E15 In-line Skate \u0E23\u0E38\u0E48\u0E19 SL-120 ')
request.add_api_param('barcodes', '[\"LZD000000063206\",\"8859295109033\"]')
request.add_api_param('hygroscopic', 'true')
request.add_api_param('precious', 'true')
request.add_api_param('product_type', 'food')
request.add_api_param('temperature_requirement', '1')
request.add_api_param('pic_urls', '[\"https://th-live-02.slatic.net/p/sportland-inailn-sekt-in-line-skate-run-sl-120-gray-yellow-s-7899-583337-d61a153af3f15bc83f31fa2aeec6db4d-catalog.jpg\"]')
request.add_api_param('serial_number_flag', 'true')
request.add_api_param('shelf_life_flag', 'true')
request.add_api_param('shelf_life_days', '1825')
request.add_api_param('reject_shelf_live', '180')
request.add_api_param('alert_shelf_live', '60')
request.add_api_param('offline_shelf_live', '30')
request.add_api_param('seller_sku', 'xxxxxxx')
request.add_api_param('sale_price', '32.25')
request.add_api_param('length', '100')
request.add_api_param('width', '100')
request.add_api_param('height', '100')
request.add_api_param('weight', '300')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
